    • Method Detail

      • getTemplate

        public static Template getTemplate(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                            throws DragonFlySqlException,
                                   DragonFlyException

        Template from Servlet request Constructor. Initiates a template based on http Servlet Request parameters. Servlet request parameters are used to initilize the Replace hash. The template to be used is specified on the KEY_COLLECTION, KEY_NAME and KEY_COLUMN parameters. If no template is provided the DEFAULT_* values are used. The KEY_CACHE_RESET parameter with a value of Yes will reset the Template Cache.

        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest
        Returns:
        Template The new Template object
        Throws:
        DragonFlyException - Invalid Directive Type
        DragonFlySqlException - Template Datasource errors
        See Also:
        Template

      • getTemplate

        public static Template getTemplate(java.lang.String collection,
                                   java.lang.String column,
                                   java.lang.String name,
                                   java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> seedReplace)
                            throws DragonFlySqlException,
                                   DragonFlyException
        Get a copy of a cached Template based on a Template Fullname, which is comprised of collection, name and columnValue (a unique key to the table dragonfly.template) The provided Replace hash is copied to the new Template before it is returned
        Parameters:
        collection - Collection Name
        column - Column Value
        name - Template Name
        seedReplace - Initial replace hash
        Returns:
        Template The new Template object
        Throws:
        DragonFlyException - Invalid Directive Type from Constructor
        DragonFlySqlException - Template Constructor Errors
        See Also:
        Template

      • reset

        public static void reset()

        Reset the cache
